system.description:
You gain the following benefits:

  • When you attack with a glaive, halberd, quarterstaff, or spear using the Attack action, you can use a bonus action to make a melee attack with the weaponâ€™s opposite end. This attack uses the same ability modifier as the primary attack, dealing 1d4 bludgeoning damage on a hit.

  • While you are wielding a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, or spear, a creature that enters your reach provokes an opportunity attack from you. A creature can use its reaction to avoid provoking an opportunity attack from you in this way.
